name: get_latest_biometric_log
add_biometric_data_after_submit
script:
# Allow updating custom_biometric_data after submission
if doc.docstatus == 1:  # If document is submitted
    # Get the original document from the database
    original_doc = frappe.get_doc("Material Request", doc.name)
    
    # Only allow changes to the biometric data table
    for field in doc.as_dict():
        if field != "custom_biometric_data" and field in original_doc.as_dict():
            if doc.get(field) != original_doc.get(field):
                frappe.throw(f"Cannot modify {field} after submission")
    
    # Allow the biometric data changes
    doc.flags.ignore_validate_update_after_submit = True
